title: 880-03 Fatʹḥ al-Mubdiʻ fī sharḥ al-Muqniʻ : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jabara qulūb al-ʻulamāʼ bi-amdād jadhrihi al-matīn, wa-fataḥa la-hum bāb istikhrāj al-majhūl min al-maʻlūm al-razīn, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh sayyid al-mursalīn, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-inna al-Muqniʻ al-manẓūm ʻalá baḥr al-ṭawīl fī ʻilm al-jabr wa-al-muqābalah, lil-Imām al-muḥaqqiq wa-al-ḥabr al-mudaqqiq, Abī al-ʻAbbās Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Hāʼim al-Shāfiʻī, ṭayyaba Allāh tharāh wa-jaʻala al-jannah maʼwāh, lammā kāna min abdaʻ kitāb fī al-jabr nuẓim, wa-ajmaʻ mawḍūʻ fīhi ʻalá miqdār ḥajmihi ruqim, ṭalaba minnī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah ʻalayy min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayy an aḍaʻa ʻalayhi sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓah, wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yuqayyidu muṭlaqah, wa-yaftaḥu mughlaqah, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, ʻalá wajh laṭīf wa-manhaj munīf, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Fatʹḥ al-Mubdiʻ fī sharḥ al-Muqniʻ ..."

title: 880-03 Fatʹḥ al-Mubdiʻ fī sharḥ al-Muqniʻ : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: Secundo folio: qawluhu ʻalá al-Nabī al-Muṣṭafá.

title: 880-03 Fatʹḥ al-Mubdiʻ fī sharḥ al-Muqniʻ : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Muqniʻ fī ʻilm al-jabr wa-al-muqābalah" in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

title: 880-03 Fatʹḥ al-Mubdiʻ fī sharḥ al-Muqniʻ : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.
note_text: The text of "al-Muqniʻ fī ʻilm al-jabr wa-al-muqābalah" starts with: "Bi-ḥamdi Ilāhī abtadī mā uḥāwilu // wa-uhdī ṣalātan maʻ salāmin yushākiluh. ʻAlá al-Muṣṭafá khayr al-anāmi wa-ālihi // wa-aṣḥābihi thumma al-duʻā yatawāṣalu. Li-fakhri al-zamān al-muntamī li-Jilāwatin // ʻAlīyin ʻalayhi suḥbu jūdin hawāṭilu ..." And it ends with: "... Wa-abyātuhā tisʻun wa-khamsūna unshiʼat // bi-al-Aqṣá wa-shahri al-yumni fa-hiya tuṭāwilu. Rabīʻun min al-ʻāmi alladhī ḍabṭu ʻaddihi // bi-Dālin wa-Ḍādin fa-al-thanā mutakāmilu." "al-Sharḥ: Ay bi-ʻām arbaʻah wa-thamānimiʼah, idh al-Dāl fī al-ḥisā̕b al-madhkūr [ḥisāb al-jummal], bi-arbaʻah, wa-al-Ḍād bi-thamānimiʼah ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Qayṣarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Aḥmadu Allāh ʻalá an qaṣara salāmat al-ṭabʻ ʻalá nawʻ al-insān, wa-aḍmara fī ṭayy ṣudūrihim ḍurūb al-awdhān [al-awzān], wa-ḥallāhum bi-natāʼij fikr tuzrī ʻalá al-laʼālī al-manthūrah fī aḥshāʼ al-buḥūr, bul tuzrī bi-al-farāʼid al-manẓūmah fī qalāʼid nuḥūr al-ḥūr, ḥamdan dāʼiman ghayr maqṭūʻ, wa-ashkuruhu shukran musbaghan bi-al-uṣūl wa-muzayyalan [wa-mudhayyalan] bi-al-furūʻ, mā wuqifa fī ghāyāt al-āyāt ʻalá al-fawāṣil wa-al-aʻjāz, wa-kushifa bi-kaff al-bayān qināʻ al-rayb ʻan wujūh al-iʻjāz ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Qayṣarī.
note_text: Secundo folio: ʻinda kaffihi al-maʻarrāt ʻan al-kaff.

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Muḥsin al-Qayṣarī.
note_text: In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī" preceded by the the word "Qāla" (He said) and the commentary by the word "Qultu" (I said), in red; markings in red; many commentaries on the margins; text within red frame surrounded by a larger frame; catchwords.

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻāmil al-ʻallāmah, al-ʻumdah al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, jāmiʻ ashtāt al-faḍāʼil, baqīyat al-salaf al-amāthil, Abū ʻAbd Allāh Aḥmad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī al-Shāfiʻī al-Makkī, aʻāda Allāh ʻalaynā min barakātihi wa-barakāt ʻulūmihi al-bāhiyah al-bāhirah, wa-afāḍa ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn min fayḍ madad buḥūr funūnihi al-zākiyah al-fākhirah, wa-taghammadahu bi-raḥmatih wa-askanahu baḥbūḥat Jannatih. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaṣṣa Nabīyanā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-Kitābihi alladhī akhrasa al-fuṣaḥāʼ wa-aʻjaza al-bulaghāʼ ʻan al-tafawwuh bi-mithl aqṣar sūrah min suwarih, bal āyah min āyātih, wa-bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim, wa-badāʼiʻ al-ḥikam, wa-ʻaẓīm al-khulq fī sāʼir aqwālih wa-afʻālih wa-ḥālātih ..."

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: Secundo folio: wa-ṣifātihi wa-shamāʼilahu lā tustaqṣá.

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa hādhā al-kitāb lillāh taʻālá Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, ʻumdat al-muḥaqqiqīn, wa-ruḥalat al-muḥaddithīn, wa-ṣadr al-mudarrisīn, Abī ʻAbd Allāh Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn al-Haythamī, al-shahīr bi-Ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī, saqá Allāh qabrahu bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān. Āmīn. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah."

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: On folio 1a: Biographical information about al-Būṣīrī, and some verses of his poetry, quoted from the commentary of al-Jawjarī (Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim, 1418-1484) on "al-Burdah" (another well-known panegyrical poem by al-Būṣirī priaising the Prophet Muḥammad), stating that al-Būṣīrī died in the year 695 of the Hijrah (1295/1296) at al-Mārastān al-Manṣūrī in Cairo.

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: On folio 1b: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah', thumma balaghanī anna al-nāẓim sammāhā 'Umm al-Qurá', tashbīhan la-hā bi-Makkah, bi-jāmiʻ annahā ḥawat bi-ṭarīq al-taṣrīḥ, aw, al-īmāʼ mā fī akthar al-madāʼiḥ, wa-ḥīnaʼidhin sammaytuhu 'Afḍal al-qirā li-qurrāʼ Umm al-Qurá' ..."

title: 880-02 al-Minaḥ al-Makkīyah fī sharḥ al-Hamzīyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.
note_text: "al-Hamzīyah" of al-Būṣīrī starts with: Kayfa tarqá ruqīyaka al-anbiyāʼu // yā samāʼan mā ṭāwalathā samāʼu. It ends with: Mā aqāma al-ṣalāta man ʻabada Allāha wa-qāmat bi-Rabbihā al-ashyāʼu.

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān kalāman muʼallafan munaẓẓaman, wa-nazzalahu bi-ḥasab al-maṣāliḥ munajjaman, wa-jaʻalahu bi-al-taḥmīd muftataḥan, wa-bi-al-istiʻādhah mukhtataman, wa-awḥāhu ʻalá qismayn mutashābihan wa-muḥkaman, wa-faṣṣalahu suwaran, wa-suwaruhu āyāt, wa-mayyaza baynahunna bi-fuṣūl wa-ghāyāt, wa-mā hiya illā ṣifāt mubtadiʼ mubtadiʻ, wa-simāt munshiʼ mukhtariʻ, fa-subḥāna man istaʼthara bi-al-awwalīyah wa-al-qidam, wa-wasama kull shayʼ bi-al-ḥudūth ʻan al-ʻadam, anshaʼahu kitāban sāṭiʻan tibyānuhu, qāṭiʻan burhānuhu, waḥyan nāṭiqan bi-bayyināt wa-ḥujaj, Qurʼānan ʻArabīyan ghayr dhī ʻiwaj, miftāḥan lil-manāfiʻ al-dīnīyah wa-al-dunyāwīyah ..."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Secundo folio: wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-Muhājirīn wa-al-Anṣār.

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: On the label of the front cover: "al-Juzʼ al-awwal min Tafsīr al-Kashshāf, min al-Fātiḥah li-ghāyat al-Aʻrāf, mudhahhab wa-muṭallā ruʼūs al-suwar."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: At the head of the text on folio 1b: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Lā yamassuhu illā al-muṭahharūn. Tanzīl min Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Sūrat al-Kahf. Makkīyah. Wa-hiya miʼah wa-iḥdá ʻashrata āyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Laqqana Allāh ʻibādahu wa-faqqaqahum kayfa yuthnūna ʻalayhi wa-yaḥmadūnahu ʻalá ajzal naʻmāʼihi ʻalayhim, wa-hiya niʻmat al-Islām, wa-mā anzala ʻalá ʻabdihi Muḥammad min al-Kitāb, alladhī huwa sabab najātihim wa-fawzihim, wa-lam yajʻal la-hu ʻiwajan, wa-lam yajʻal la-hu shayʼan min al-ʻiwaj qaṭṭ. Wa-al-ʻiwaj fī al-maʻānī ka-al-ʻiwaj fī al-aʻyān ..."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Secundo folio: Allāh waladan mutaʻalliq bi-al-mundharīn.

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Colophon: No colophon. The work ends with the commentary on Sūrat al-Nās (Chapter 114, the last sūrah of the Qurʼān) and a pious invocation by the author: "Qāla ʻabd Allāh al-faqīr ilayhi: Wa-anā aʻūdh bi-himā [al-Muʻawwidhatayn], wa-bi-jamīʻ kalimāt Allāh al-kāmilah al-tāmmah, wa-alūdhu bi-kanaf raḥmatihi al-shāmilah al-ʻāmmah min kull mā yaklimu al-dīn wa-yathlimu al-yaqīn ... wa-asʼaluhu bi-khuḍūʻ al-ʻunq wa-khushūʻ al-baṣar, wa-bi-mā ʻunītu bi-hi min muhājaratī ilayhi, wa-mujāwaratī wa-murābaṭatī bi-Makkah wa-muṣābaratī ... wa-bi-mā laqītu min kadḥ al-yamīn wa-ʻaraq al-jabīn fī ʻamal al-Kashshāf ... bayna ẓahrānay al-Ḥaram wa-bayna yaday al-Bayt al-Muḥarram, ḥattá waqaʻa al-taʼwīl ḥaythu wujida al-Tanzīl, an yahaba lī khātimat al-khayr, wa-yaqiyanī maṣāriʻ al-sūʼ, wa-yatajāwaza ʻan faraṭātī Yawm al-Tanād, wa-lā yafḍaḥanī bi-hā ʻalá ruʼūs al-ashhād, wa-yaḥullanī Dār al-Maqāmah, min faḍlihi, bi-wāsiʻ ṭawlihi wa-sābigh thawābih. Innahu Huwa al-jawwād al-karīm, al-raʼūf al-raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm. (Seal of Muḥammad Ismāʻīl)."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Sūrat al-Aʻrāf Makkīyah, ghayr thamān āyāt: 'Wa-salhum ʻan al-Qaryah' ilá 'Wa-idh nataqnā'. Wa-hiya miʼatān wa-khams āyāt. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb: Khabar mubtadaʼ maḥdhūf, ay, huwa Kitāb, wa-unzila ilayka ṣifah la-hu, wa-al-murād bi-al-Kitāb al-sūrah, fa-lā yakun fī ṣadrika ḥaraj minhu, ay, shakk minhu, ka-qawlihi: Fa-in kunta fī shakk mimmā anzalnā ilayka, wa-maʻná al-shakk ḥarijan, li-anna al-shākk ḍayyiq al-ṣadr ḥarijuhu, kamā anna al-mutayaqqin munshariḥ al-ṣadr munfasiḥuhu, ay, lā tashukka fī annahu muzal min Allāh, aw, ḥarij min tablīghih, li-annahu kāna yakhāfu qawmahu wa-takdhībahum la-hu wa-iʻrāḍahum ʻanhu wa-adhāhum, fa-kāna yaḍīqu ṣadruhu min al-adāʼ wa-lā yanbasiṭu la-hu, fa-ammanahu Allāh wa-nahāhu min al-mubālāh bi-him ..."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Secundo folio: wa-qalīlan nuṣiba bi-tadhakkarūn.

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: The commentary on Sūrat al-Kahf ends with: "ʻAn Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Man qaraʼa Sūrat al-Kahf, kadhā, min ākhirihā kānat la-hu nūran min qarnihi ilá qadamih, wa-man qaraʼahā kullahā kānat la-hu nūran min al-arḍ ilá al-samāʼ. Wa-ʻanhu, ʻalayhi al-salām: Man qaraʼa ʻinda maḍjaʻihi: 'Qul innamā anā basharun mithlukum', kāna la-hu fī maḍjaʻihi nūr yatalaʼlaʼu ilá Makkah taḥshū dhālika al-nūr malāʼikah yuṣallūna ʻalayhi ḥattá yaqūm, wa-in kāna maḍjaʻuhu bi-Makkah kāna la-hu nūr yatalaʼlaʼu min maḍjaʻihi ilá al-Bayt, ḥashū dhālika al-nūr malāʼikah yuṣallūna ʻalayhi ḥattá yastayqiẓa ..."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá ʻUmar Afandī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, fī yawm al-Jumʻah, rābiʻ ʻishrīn shahr al-Qaʻdah, sanat 1166."

title: 880-03 al-Kashshāf ʻan ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanzīl. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar al-Zamakhsharī.
note_text: Translation of the Colophon: "The copy was completed by the hand of the poor to God Almighty, ʻUmar Afandī, may God forgive him and his parents, on Friday, 24 al-Qaʻdah, 1166 [of the Hijrah = 22 September, 1753]."

title: 880-01 Kitāb fī maʻrifat al-burj wa-al-manāzil wa-maʻrifat al-qamar wa-al-awtād : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Kitāb fī maʻrifat al-burj wa-al-manāzil wa-maʻrifat al-qamar wa-al-awtād'. Iʻlam innaka idhā aradta an taʻrifa burj al-qamar, fa-unẓur mā maḍá min al-shahr al-ʻArabī wa-zid qadrahu, wa-zidhu khamsah, wa-aʻṭi li-kull burj khamsah, wa-ibtadī min burj al-shams, fa-al-muntahī ilayhi huwa burj al-qamar ..."

title: 880-01 Kitāb fī maʻrifat al-burj wa-al-manāzil wa-maʻrifat al-qamar wa-al-awtād : manuscript.
note_text: Secundo folio: suʻūd maqdam naṭḥ Thurayyā.

title: 880-01 Kitāb fī maʻrifat al-burj wa-al-manāzil wa-maʻrifat al-qamar wa-al-awtād : manuscript.
note_text: In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; several astrological/astronomical charts and diagrams; catchwords.

title: 880-01 Kitāb fī maʻrifat al-burj wa-al-manāzil wa-maʻrifat al-qamar wa-al-awtād : manuscript.
note_text: On folio 1a: A poem in nine verses (in broken Arabic and unbalanced rhythm), by an anonymous author, praising a dignitary named "al-ʻĪsāwī" and his noble Hashemite descent.

title: 880-01 Kitāb fī maʻrifat al-burj wa-al-manāzil wa-maʻrifat al-qamar wa-al-awtād : manuscript.
note_text: Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... fa-innahu lā yukmilu sabʻat ayyām ḥattá yará al-ʻajab min al-maṭlūb wa-yaṣīru tibʻan la-hu, kamā yatbaʻu al-walad ummahu, wa-al-kawkab burjahu. Wa-al-āyah hiya: 'ʻAsá Allāh an yajʻala baynakum wa-bayna alladhīna ʻādaytum minhum mawaddah', wa-hiya ṣifat al-khātim, kamā tará al-masʼalah al-thāniyah. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh muyassir al-ḥisāb, wa-muhawwin al-ṣiʻāb, wa-musayyir al-ḥussāb, aḥmaduhu ḥamdan yaftaḥu lanā min al-khayrāt kulla bāb, wa-ashkuruhu shukran yaʻṣimunā bi-hi min al-artiyāb, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah shahādata ʻabdin awwāb, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu, al-nāṭiq bi-al-ṣawāb, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-jamīʻ al-aṣḥāb. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī: Hādhā mukhtaṣar fī ʻilam al-ḥisāb, yusahhil li-man yurīdu al-shurūʻ fī al-farāʼiḍ min ulī al-albāb, mushtamil ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāthat abwāb wa-khātimah yatimmu bi-hā al-kitāb. Sammaytuhu: Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb ..."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: Secundo folio: al-aṣlī thalāthat anwāʻ.

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb, kitāb mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb, lil-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-Allāh aʻlam."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations in poetry and prose.

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: Colophon: "Wa-fī hādhā al-qadr kifāyah lil-mubtadiʼ. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-aḥbāb fī ʻilm al-ḥisāb : manuscript / Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Sibṭ al-Māridīnī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon: "What was introduced in sufficient for the beginner. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāhumma iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mulhim lil-ṣawāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-nāṭiq bi-al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-kirām wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān ʻalá al-dawām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, ballaghahu Allāh al-āmāl wa-razaqahu al-tawfīq fī al-aqwāl wa-al-afʻāl: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ṭalabah al-mubtadiʼīn an ashraḥa Sullam al-manṭiq sharḥan yakūnu fī ghāyat al-līn wa-an lā azīda ʻalá ḥall alfāẓihi, li-yaẓfara bi-fahm maʻnāh man huwa min ḥuffāẓihi, fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālik mustaʻīnan bi-al-Qādir al-Mālik, musammiyan īyāhu bi-Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam, ṭāliban min al-Samīʻ al-Baṣīr an yanfaʻa bi-hi kamā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihi, innahu ʻalá dhālika qadīr ..."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Secundo folio: al-afhām wa-Allāh ʻalam ʻalá al-dhāt al-wājib al-wujūd.

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Kitāb Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī al-Ḥanafī, fasaḥ Allāh fī muddatih wa-nafaʻa bi-hi, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. M M."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā kitābatahu. Nasʼalu Man waffaqanā la-hu an yanfaʻa [bi-hi]. Innahu ʻalá dhālika qadīr. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Tamma al-sharḥ. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of what we wanted to write. We ask Him who enabled us for what we accomplished to benefit [us] by it. He is able on doing this. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. The commentary is concluded. God is more knowledgeable.

title: 880-02 Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb : manuscript / Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr ibn al-Masīḥī.
note_text: Incipit: The beginning of the manuscript is missing. The text starts with: "... minhu dalālah mā, wa-laysa maʻa hādhā bi-muṭṭaridah, mithl anna al-nawʻ al-wāḥid in kānat la-hu aṣnāf mukhtalifah fa-abyaḍuhā abraduhā, wa-alladhī minhā aḥmar aw aswad aḥarruhā, mithl inna hādhā ayḍan laysa bi-mustamirr fī kull al-anwāʻ, fa-iʻlam dhālik. Kam hiya al-ashyah [al-ashyāʼ] allatī iḍṭarrat al-aṭibāʼ ilá tarkīb al-adwiyah al-mufradah? Sittah: Aḥaduhā, ikhtilāf maqādīr al-amrāḍ; wa-al-thānī, ikhtilāf jihāt istiʻmāl al-adwiyah; wa-al-thālith, taṭyīb ṭaʻm al-dawāʼ li-yashula shurbuhu ..."

title: 880-02 Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb : manuscript / Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr ibn al-Masīḥī.
note_text: Secundo folio: wa-in kāna murakkaban min thalāthah.

title: 880-02 Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb : manuscript / Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr ibn al-Masīḥī.
note_text: Author's colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir al-masāʼil al-ṭibbīyah al-mushtamilah ʻalá jumal min ʻilm al-ṭibb, quṣida bi-hā li-takūna madkhalan lil-mubtadī wa-tadhkirah lil-muntahī. Wa-fī dhālika kifāyah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

title: 880-02 Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb : manuscript / Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr ibn al-Masīḥī.
note_text: Translation of the author's colophon: "This is the end of the medical issues which included miscellaneous aspects of the science of medicine, intended to be an introduction to the beginner and a memorandum to the accomplished. Enough said. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. Amen. It is concluded."

title: 880-02 Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb : manuscript / Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr ibn al-Masīḥī.
note_text: Copyist's colophon: "Tamma Kitāb 'Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb', masʼalah wa-jawāb, fī khamsah min Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām alladhī huwa min shuhūr <khamsah> sittah wa-sabʻīn baʻda al-miʼatayn wa-al-alf bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-ṣallá Allāh taʻālá ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-sallam."

title: 880-02 Intikhāb al-Iqtiḍāb : manuscript / Saʻīd ibn Abī al-Khayr ibn al-Masīḥī.
note_text: Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The book of 'Selection from the Compendium', in the form of question and answer, was completed on 5 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 1276 [of the Hijrah = 25 May, 1860] by the help of God Almighty and His abundant benevolence. May God Almighty pray on our Master Muḥammad and his family and grant them peace."

title: 880-02 al-Tadhhīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Khabīṣī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Inna aḥaqq mā yatazayyanu bi-nashrihi manṭiq al-qāṣī wa-al-ḥāḍir, wa-yatawashshaḥ bi-dhikrihi ṣudūr al-kutub wa-al-dafātir, ḥamd Allāh, jalla jalāluh, ʻalá al-āyah al-muzhirat al-riyāḍ, wa-shukruhu, ʻamma nawāluh, ʻalá naʻmāʼihi al-mutraʻat al-ḥiyāḍ, alladhī sharrafa nawʻ al-insān bi-ḥilyat al-idrāk, wa-zaīnat al-ifhām, wa-khaṣṣaṣahu bi-idrāj durar al-maʻānī fī jawāhir al-alfāẓ ʻalá sharṭ al-intiẓām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá Allāh al-ghanī ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Khabīṣī ... lammā raʼaytu al-mukhtaṣar al-musammá bi-al-Tahdhīb, al-mansūb ilá ... Saʻd al-Millah wa-al-Dīn Masʻūd al-Taftāzānī ... kitāban mushtamilan ʻalá akthar masāʼil al-Risālah al-Shamsīyah fī tamhīd al-qawāʻid al-manṭiqīyah ... sharaḥtuhu sharḥan yubayyinu muʻḍilātih wa-yufassiru mushkilātih ... wasamtuhu bi-al-Tadhhīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb ..."

title: 880-02 al-Tadhhīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Khabīṣī.
note_text: Secundo folio: al-muḥaṣṣilūn ʻan fahm rasāʼilihi.

title: 880-02 al-Tadhhīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Khabīṣī.
note_text: Author's colophon: "Hādhā ākhir mā aradnā īrādahu fī 'Sharḥ' al-kitāb. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb ... Thumma jazā Allāh khayran man taʼammala ṣanʻatī wa-qābala mā fīhā min al-sahw bi-al-ʻafw, wa-aṣlaḥa mā akhṭaʼtu fīhi bi-faḍlihi wa-fiṭnatih. Wa-astaghfiru Allāh min sahwī, fa-innī muʻtarif bi-qillat al-biḍāʻah wa-rijlī fī miḍmār tilka al-ṣināʻah, idh lam yatayassar ilayya al-iṭṭilāʻ ʻalá al-kutub al-manṭiqīyah illā ʻalá 'Sharḥ al-Risālah al-Shamsīyah', wa-istakhrajtu minhu al-masāʼil ʻalá ḥasb dhihnī wa-dahāʼī, wa-istafadtu minhu al-fawāʼid ʻalá qadr fahmī wa-dhakāʼī, fa-katabtuhā fī hādhā al-kitāb bi-tabṣirah li-man tabaṣṣar, wa-tadhkirah li-man arāda an yatadhakkar. Wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān wa-ʻalayhi al-tiklān. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 al-Tadhhīb fī sharḥ al-Tahdhīb : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Faḍl Allāh al-Khabīṣī.
note_text: Translation of the author's colophon: "This is the end of what we wanted to introduce of the 'Commentary' on the book. God is more knowledgeable of what is correct, to Him is the reference and returning ... Also, may God reward well him who investigates my work and forgives what he finds of inattentiveness, or corrects what mistakes I made, according to his favor and perspicacity. I ask God's forgiveness for any forgetfulness, and admit my meager knowledge and the lack of the agility of my leg in the arena of this art; as I was not able to inspect the books on logic, except 'the Commentary on al-Risālah al-Shamsīyah', of which I extracted the issues according to my mind and intelligence, and acquired benefits from it according to my understanding and acumen, which I recorded in this book, as an instruction for him who wants to ponder, and a memorandum for him who wants to remember. Help comes from God, and on Him is the reliance. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and on his family and companions and grant them peace. Amen."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mulhim lil-ṣawāb, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-nāṭiq bi-al-ḥikmah wa-faṣl al-khiṭāb, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-kirām wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-man tabiʻahum ʻalá al-dawām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, ballaghahu Allāh al-āmāl wa-razaqahu al-tawfīq fī al-aqwāl wa-al-afʻāl: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-ṭalabah al-mubtadiʼīn an ashraḥa Sullam al-manṭiq sharḥan yakūnu fī ghāyat al-līn, wa-an lā azīda ʻalá ḥall alfāẓihi, li-yaẓfara bi-fahm maʻnāhu man huwa min ḥuffāẓihi, fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālika, mustaʻīnan bi-al-Qādir al-Mālik, musammaiyan la-hu bi-Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam, ṭāliban min al-Samīʻ al-Baṣīr an yanfaʻa bi-hi kamā nafaʻa bi-aṣlihi, innahu ʻalá dhālika qadīr ..."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Secundo folio: wa-al-nisbah bayna al-thalāthah fī risālatinā.

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Author's colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā aradnā kitābatahu. Nasʼalu Man waffaqanā la-hu an yanfaʻa bi-hi. Innahu ʻalá dhālika qadīr. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Translation of the author's colophon: "This is the end of what we wanted to write. We ask Him who enabled us for what we accomplished to benefit [us] by it. He is able on doing this. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace.

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Copyist's colophon: "Waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Ithnayn, fī khāmis ʻashar yawman min shahr Ṣafar, sanat 1194, arbaʻah wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf."

title: 880-02 Īḍāḥ al-mubham min maʻānī al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.
note_text: Translation of the copyist's colophon: "Copied on Monday, 15 Ṣafar, 1194 [of the Hijrah = 21 February, 1780]."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-ʻālim bi-al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt, al-hādī lil-ʻuqūl ilá ḥall ṣiʻāb al-maʻqūl bi-ṭuruq iktisāb al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, al-jāmiʻ li-ajnās al-kamālāt wa-al-faḍāyil, al-mukhtār min afḍal al-anwāʻ wa-al-[...?] ashraf aṣnāf al-urūmāt wa-al-qabāʼil, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi [...] dhawī al-ʻuqūl al-zakīyah wa-ṣāʼibī al-anẓār, wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn wa-man tabiʻahum bi-iḥsān min dhawī al-anwār wa-badīʻ al-asrār. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad kuntu sharaḥtu fīmā maḍá kitāb al-Sullam sharḥan badīʻ al-itqān, mushtamilan ʻalá farāʼid al-taḥqīqāt wa-nikāt al-tadqīqāt wa-badāʼiʻ al-ʻirfān, dhallaltu fīhi ṣiʻāb al-mushkilāt ʻalá ṭarīq al-tamām, wa-istakhrajtu minhu mustawdaʻāt asrār wa-ẓarāʼif afhām, wa-ẓafirtu minhu bi-daqāʼiq anẓār wa-mukhabbaʼāt asrār, ihtadaytu fīhi ʻalá gharāʼib nikāt wa-ʻarāʼis abkār, thumma raʼaytu anna al-himam al-ān qad qaṣurat, wa-al-ʻuqūl fī hādhā al-zamān qad taballadat wa-takaddarat, fa-ṣaraftu al-himmah thāniyan naḥwa al-ikhtiṣār wa-al-iqtiṣār ʻalá al-taḥqīqāt wa-nabdh al-aghyār, māzijan lil-sharḥ bi-al-shurūḥ imtizāj al-māʼ bi-al-rāḥ wa-al-jasad bi-al-rūḥ ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Secundo folio: fīmā akhrajahu al-aʼimmah.

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb sharḥ al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Mullawī al-Shāfiʻī ʻalá matn al-Sullam fī ʻilm al-manṭiq."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ al-Sullam, lil-Shaykh al-Mullawī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi. Āmīn. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah yawm al-Thalāth al-mubārak, li-sittah (6) khalat min shuhūr alf wa-miʼah thamāniyah wa-tisʻīn, sanat 1198 min al-Jihrah [al-Hijrah] al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon: "This copy was written on blessed Tuesday, six having passed from the months of the year 1198 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [probably 6 Jumādá al-Thāniyah, 1198 = 27 April, 1784], may the best prayer and peace be upon him."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit of "al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Kitāb al-ṭīb [al-ṭibb] al-kīmiyāwī alladhī ikhtaraʻahu Baraklistūsh [Barākalsūs: Paracelsus, 1493-1541], yashmalu ʻalá muqaddimāt wa-maqālāt. al-Muqaddimah al-ūlá fī taʻrīf al-kīmiyāʼ, wa-li-bayān al-ḥājah ilayhā, wa-al-gharaḍ minhā. Fa-naqūlu: al-Kīmiyāʼ lafẓ Yūnānī, fī aṣlihi khimiyā, wa-maʻnāhu al-taḥlīl wa-al-tafrīq, wa-baʻḍ al-nās yuṭliqu ʻalayhā al-ṣināʻah al-Hirmisīyah. Wa-qāla qawm: Yuṭlaqu ʻalayhā amr al-kahanah. Wa-awwal min ightaraʻahā [ikhtaraʻahā] huw Hirmis al-Thulth [al-Muthallath] al-Miṣrī, wa-ʻallamahā al-kahanah. Wa-baʻd dhālika shāʻat ḥattá waṣalat ilá al-Yūnān, wa-ṣannafū fī dhālika kutuban wa-rasāʼil, ilá al-Islāmīyīn, wa-allafū fīhā kutuban kathīrah wa-rasāʼil ʻadīdah. Wa-al-maqṣūd min dhālika iṣlāḥ al-maʻdin [al-maʻādin] wa-taghyīrihā min al-fasād ilá al-ṣalāḥ, ka-qalb al-nuḥās fiḍḍah wa-al-fiḍḍah dhahaban, ilá an jāʼa Barākāshūsh al-Ḥirāfī [Barākalsūs al-Jirmānī], fa-ghayyara al-gharaḍ min ṣināʻat al-kīmiyāʼ, wa-jaʻalahu min aqsām ṣanʻat al-ṭibb, wa-sammāhu istāgharā bi-al-Lātīnīyah, wa-maʻnāhu jamʻ al-mukhallafāt wa-tafrīquhā, wa-hādhā al-ism makhṣūṣ bi-ṣināʻat al-ṭibb al-kīmiyāʼī ..."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Secundo folio of "al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī": wa-al-kīmiyāʼ al-ṭayyibah [al-ṭibbīyah] wa-qad tuṭlaqu al-kīmiyāʼ ʻalá al-ḥikmah.

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit of "Kīmiyāʼ bāsilīqā (or, al-Kimiyāʼ al-malakīyah)": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ʻalá manbaʻ al-ḥikmah fī al-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna iqtabasū min mishkāt nūrih, fa-hum hudāt al-dīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-qad allafa fī ṣināʻat al-ṭibb al-kīmiyāʼī Faraliyūsh [Qarūliliyūs: Croll, Oswald, approximately 1560-1609] kitāban mukhtaṣaran mufīdan li-malik zamānih, wa-huwa yashmalu ʻalá maqālatayn, fa-aradnā an nanqulahu min al-Lātīnīyah ilá al-ʻArabīyah, li-yakun [li-yakūna] bihā tamām al-nafʻ, wa-sammá hādhā al-kitāb Kimiyā nalīqā [bāsilīqā], yaʻnī al-Kimiyāʼ al-malakīyah ..."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Secundo folio of "Kīmiyāʼ bāsilīqā (or, al-Kimiyāʼ al-malakīyah)": min al-akhlāṭ al-fāsidah.

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Colophon of "al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī": "... Wa-hādhā ākhir mā ikhtarnāhu wa-naqalnāhu min kitāb Shinārtūsh al-Ḥirāfī [Sināritūs al-Jirmānī: Daniel Sennert, 1572-1637], alladhī fī ṣināʻat al-ṭbb, wa-min Qarabādīn Wāfarbūsh [Wāqiriyūs: Johann Jacob Wecker, 1528-1586] min [fī] taqṭīr al-arwāḥ wa-al-adʹhān. Wa-bi-hi tamma al-kitāb. Wa-Allāh al-mahdī ilá al-ṣawāb, wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Āmīn. Āmīn."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon of "al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī": "This is the end of what we selected and translated from the book of Senartus the Germanic [Daniel Sennert, 1572-1637], which is about the profession of medicine, and from Qarabādīn (Pharmaceutics) of Wāqirbūs [Wāqiryūs: Johann Jacob Wecker, 1528-1586] about the distillation of spirits and oils, by which the book is concluded. God is the one who guides to what is correct. To Him is the reference and returning. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on him who no prophet comes after him [Prophet Muḥammad]. Amen. Amen."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Colophon of "Kīmiyāʼ bāsilīqā (or, al-Kimiyāʼ al-malakīyah)": "Wa-Allāh aʻlam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Wa-al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. H."

title: 880-03 al-Ṭibb al-jadīd al-kīmiyāʼī : manuscript / Ṣāliḥ ibn Naṣr Allāh ibn Sallūm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon of "Kīmiyāʼ bāsilīqā (or, al-Kimiyāʼ al-malakīyah)": "God is more knowledgeable. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on him who no prophet comes after him [Prophet Muḥammad]. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. H."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Incipit: The first leaf is missing. Starts with: "... Abtadá [Abtadī], aw, ibtidāʼī, aw, uʼallifu, aw, taʼlīfī. Wa-ibtadaʼa bi-al-Basmalah taʼassiyan bi-al-Qurʼān al-ʻazīz, wa-imtithālan li-muqtaḍá qawlihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fīmā akhrajahu al-aʼimmah 'Kull amr dhī bāl lā bubdaʼu fīhi bi-bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm fa-huwa ajdham', ay, maqṭūʻ al-barakah, wa-fī riwāyah 'bi-ḥamd Allāh', rawāhu Abū Dāwūd wa-ghayruhu, wa-ḥassanahu Ibn al-Ṣalāḥ wa-ghayruhu ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Secundo folio: alladhī ka-al-saḥāb wa-min bayānīyah.

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Colophon: "Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Fattāḥ al-Mullawī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Naḥmaduka yā man afāḍa ʻalá riyāḍ ʻuqūlinā ghuyūth saḥāʼib al-taṣawwurāt wa-al-taṣdīqāt, wa-aṭlaʻa fī samāwāt baṣāʼirinā shumūs maʻrifat al-kullīyāt wa-al-juzʼīyāt. Wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā anta waḥdaka, lā sharīka lak, al-munʻim ʻalá ajnās al-makhlūqāt bi-anwāʻ al-hibāt. Wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduka wa-rasūluk al-mabʻūth bi-al-burhān al-wāḍiḥ wa-al-qawl al-shāriḥ wa-al-āyāt al-bayyināt, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā tarannamat ashkāl al-ghuṣūn bi-anfās al-nasamāt, wa-afṣaḥa dhū manṭiq ʻammā fī khazāʼin ḍamīrihi min al-mukawwināt. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī al-ghufrān Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, aḥsana Allāh ʻamalah wa-ballaghahu fī al-dārayn amalah: Lammā manna al-Mawlá al-laṭīf ʻalá hādhā al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf bi-qirāʼat al-Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr ʻalá al-Sullam li-Shaykhinā al-ruḥalah al-Ustādh al-Mullawī, ʻalá muʼallafihi wa-ʻalayhi ruḍwān al-Rabb al-akram, wa-bi-qrāʼī dhālika al-kitāb li-jamm ghafīr min maharat al-ṭullāb, wa-taḥaṣṣala minhā mā yassarahu Allāh taʻālá min taqrīrāt sharīfah wa-taḥqīqāt badīʻah munīfah wa-nikāt almaʻīyah wa-daqāʼiq lawdhaʻīyah naẓamtuhā fī silk al-taṣnīf wa-jaʻaltuhā ḥāshiyah ʻalá hādhā al-Sharḥ al-munīf ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Secundo folio: wa-tasāhala fī mawāḍiʻ kathīrah.

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Ḥāshiyat al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah wa-al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah al-Shaykh al-Ṣabbān ʻalá Mullawī al-Sullam. Manṭiq."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Author's colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Tamma tabyīḍ hādhihi al-Ḥāshiyah ʻalá yad muʼallifihā al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Mawlāh, Muḥammad al-Ṣabbān, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-al-ghufrān wa-al-iḥsān, wa-kāna tamām tabyīḍihā yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ li-arbaʻ layālin baqiyat min shahr Muḥarram al-ḥarām, ifttitāḥ sanat 1197, sabʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-atamm al-salām."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Translation of the author's colophon: "Its author said: The fair copy of this Gloss was completed by the hand of its author, the poor to the mercy of his Lord, Muḥammad al-Ṣabbān, may God bestow upon him forgiveness and favor, having been completed on Wednesday, four nights remaining from the month of Muḥarram, the beginning of the year 1197 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1 January, 1783], may the best prayer and the most perfect peace be upon Him."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Copyist's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihā yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ ayḍan, baʻda al-ẓuhr, tāsiʻ ʻashar yawm maḍá min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, ʻaqiba mawlid Sayyidinā al-Imām al-Ḥusayn, sanat 1225, khamsah wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf, ʻalá yad kātibihā, bi-yadihi al-fāniyah, al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-ʻAlī al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Farghalī al-Anṣārī nasaban al-Khazrajī qabīlatan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban al-Ṭahṭāʼī baladan al-Azʹharī iqāmatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-li-muḥbbīhi wa-li-man naẓara fīhi wa-daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-raḥmah, wa-li-man wajada ʻayban wa-aṣlaḥahu. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān.
note_text: Translation of the copyist's colophon: "It was copied also on Wednesday, in the afternoon, 19 days having passed from the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, after the birthday of our Master al-Imām al-Ḥusayn, in the year 1225 [of the Hijrah = 24 May, 1810], by the perishing hand of its copyist, the poor servant, who admits his inability and his insufficiency, he who hopes for the forgiveness of his Mighty Lord the Creator, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Farghalī al-Anṣārī nasaban al-Khazrajī qabīlatan al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban al-Ṭahṭāʼī baladan al-Azʹharī iqāmatan, may God forgive him, his parents, his teachers, his loved ones, him who looks into it and invokes God to forgive him and have mercy upon him, and him who finds a blemish in it and corrects it. May God prey on our Master Muḥammad and grant him peace."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Allāhumma lā sahl illā mā jaʻaltahu sahlan. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala qulūb al-ʻulamāʼ samāwāt tatajallá fīhā shumūs al-maʻārif, wa-wassaʻa dawāyir afhāmihim fa-awlajahum qibāb al-mukhaddarāt min ʻarāyis al-maʻānī wa-al-laṭāyif, wa-ḥabāhum bi-ḥadāyiq al-ʻuqūl fa-tanāwalū min thamarātihā, fa-aṣbaḥt āfāq ʻuqūlihim mushriqah bi-aqmār al-ʻulūm, fa-fāqū man ʻadāhum min al-wará, wa-istaqwaw ʻalá dhurá al-majd wa-ʻalaw ʻalá manābir al-ʻizz bimā sabaqa lahum fī al-Kitāb al-marqūm, fa-tāhū fī riḥāb al-ʻilm wa-ʻaraṣāt al-fahm ʻalá bisāṭ ḥujaj al-maʻqūl ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: Secundo folio: ṭalaban li-taḥqīq al-manqūl.

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-Sullam lil-Akhḍarī. Sharḥ al-Sullam lil-Akhḍarī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá raḥmatan wāsiʻah. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: On folio 2a: "Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā waḍaʻtu al-urjūzah al-musammāh bi-'al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq', wa-jāt [wa-jāʼat], bi-ḥamd Allāh, jumlatan [jumaluhu] kāfiyah, wa-li-maqāṣid <fī fann ʻilm> fannihā ḥāwiyah, rāwadanī baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-ṭalabah, akramahum Allāh, al-marrah baʻda al-marrah, ʻalá an aḍaʻa ʻalyahā sharḥan mufīdan yabuththu mā inṭawat ʻalayhi min al-maʻānī, wa-yashīdu mā taqāṣara fīhā min al-mabānī, fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālika ṭalaban [ṭāliban] min Allāh ḥusn al-tawfīq ilá manābiʻ al-taḥqīq, wa-in kuntu lastu ahlan li-dhālik, wa-lākin ḥamalanī ʻalayhi tafāwulī. Wa-lam aḍaʻhu li-man huwa aʻlá minnī, bal li-amthālī min al-mubtadʼīn. Fa-Allāh Allāh, yā akhī al-iʻtidhār wa-tark al-iʻtirāḍ ʻalá al-muʼminīn, wa-iltamis al-ʻudhr li-akhīka al-muʼmin, wa-sāl [wa-sal] Allāh ilayhi fī al-duʻāʼ wa-li-wālidayya bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-raḥmah, raḥimaka Allāh taʻālá. Wa-Allāh walī al-tawfīq ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: On folio 2b: The text of 'al-Sullam al-murawnaq fī ʻilm al-manṭiq' starts with: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qad akhraja // natāʼij al-fikr li-arbāb al-ḥijā ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā [min] kitābat hādhā al-sharḥ al-ʻaẓīm yawm al-Ithnayn, khams ʻashar Shaʻbān al-mubārak, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat tisʻah wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼatayn baʻda al-alf, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihā [wa-aḥwajihim] ilá Rabbihi al-Jawwād, Ibrāhīm Ḥasan Amīn al-Dīn, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu, wa-ghafara la-hu wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Sullam : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Akhḍarī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. This great commentary was concluded on Monday, the fifteenth of blessed Shaʻbān, of the year 1229 [of the Hijrah = 2 August, 1814], by the hand of the poorest of mankind and the neediest to his Benevolent Lord, Ibrāhīm Ḥasan Amīn al-Dīn, may God pardon him and forgive him who offers and invocation for his forgiveness. Amen."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Incipit of al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-lil-shiʻr mīzānun yusammá ʻarūḍahu // bi-hā al-naqṣ wa-al-rujḥān yadrīhimā al-fatá. Wa-anwāʻuhu qul khamsataʻshara kulluhā // tuʼallafu min juzʼayni farʻayni lā siwá ..."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Secundo folio of the al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qafīyah: Wa-qul watidun in zidta ḥarfan bilā imtirā.

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Incipit of Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waḍaʻa ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ li-yuʻrafa bi-hi awzān al-manẓūm, wa-jaʻala afkāranā qāfiyah li-āthār al-ʻulamāʼ bi-al-manṭūq wa-al-mafhūm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-Mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá al-Khazrajīyah al-manẓūmah ʻalá baḥr al-ṭawīl fī ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qawāfī, naẓm al-ʻallāmah Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn Abī Muḥammad ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Khazrajī al-Mālikī al-Andalusī, yaḥullu alfāẓahā wa-yubayyinu murādahā wa-yaftaḥu rumūzahā, wa-sammaytuhu bi-Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi wa-yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi ..."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Secundo folio of "Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah: ālah yuʻrafu bi-hā miqdār.

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Incipit of Treatise on the new meters in Arabic poetry (folio 79a): "Fāʼidah. Baḥr al-mutadārak istakhrajahu al-Akhfash min baḥr al-mutaqārib, wa-ikhtalafa fīhi ʻan al-Khalīl; fa-qāla al-akthar: 'Naṣṣa ʻalá ṭarḥihi wa-laysa ʻindahu shiʻran [shiʻrun].' Wa-qāla qawm: 'Lam yamnaʻhu wa-lam yuthbithu, immā li-annahu lam yablughhu, wa-tadārakahu al-Akhfash, wa-li-hādhā summiya al-mutadārak' ..."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Secundo folio of Treatise on the new meters in Arabic poetry: wa-qīla dakhalahu al-qaṭʻ wa-jarat al-ʻillah fīhi majrá al-zuḥāf.

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Incipit of Treatise on the sixteen classical meters of Arabic poetry including phrases quoted from the Qurʼān (folio 81a): "Wa-hādhihi abyāt tajmaʻu ʻarūḍ al-abḥur al-sittata ʻashar, bi-istishhād bi-āyāt min al-Qurʼān al-Karīm lil-Bīr, raḥimahu Allāh wa-raḍiya ʻanhu: Ṭawīl. Ṭawīlun madá al-hijrān man kuntu ahwāhu // adhāba fuʼādī wa-al-taṣabburu afnāhu. Faʻūlun mafāʻīlun faʻūlun mafāʻilun // wa-lā taqtulu al-nafsa allatī ḥarrama Allāhu ..."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Secundo folio of Treatise on the sixteen classical meters of Arabic poetry including phrases quoted from the Qurʼān: Mustafʻilun fāʻilun mustafʻilun faʻilun.

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: On folio 1a: "al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah fī al-qawānīn al-ʻarūḍīyah, taʼlīf al-Shaykh Ḍiyāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Andalusī al-Khazrajī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn. Āmīn."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: On folio 1a: Four verses on poetry naming the fifteen classical meters of Arabic poetry, and a note stating that the sixteenth meter "al-Mutadārak" was mentioned by al-Akhfash (al-Akhfash al-Awsaṭ, Saʻīd ibn Masʻadah, died approximately 830).

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: On folio 28a: A collation and correction note: "Balagha muqābalatan wa-qirāʼatan wa-taṣḥīḥan min Mawlānā wa-Sayyidinā al-Shaykh al-fāḍil wa-al-baḥr al-zākhir, ḥāwī al-kamālāt wa-al-faḍāʼil, al-Shaykh Yaḥyá al-Faraḍī al-Shāfiʻī, ḥafiẓahu Allāh [Probably: Yaḥyá ibn Taqī al-Dīn al-Faraḍī, active 1619]. Katabahu al-faqīr Muḥammad Shaʻʻāl."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah ends with: "... Wa-qad kamult sittan wa-tisʻīna fa-alladhī // tawassaʻa fī dhā al-ʻilmi tūsiʻuhu ḥubbā. Wa-yasʼalu ʻAbdu Allāhi dhā al-Khazrajīyu min // muṭāliʻihā itḥāfahu minhu bi-al-duʻā."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Half of folio 84 is torn up. On folio 84b are written some verses of poetry in Maghribi script.

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Colophon of al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah: "Tammat. Katabahā Muḥammad al-Ḥurr, ʻufiya ʻanhu."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon of al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah: "It is completed. Copied by Muḥammad al-Ḥurr, may he be pardoned."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Colophon of Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah (folio 79a): "Tamma Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah fī salkh shahr Ramaḍān, yawm al-Thalāth, min sanat ithnayn wa-sabʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah bi-al-Mashhad al-Aqdas, ʻalá musharrifihi al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥurr, ʻafá Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu. Āmīn."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon of Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah: "Fatḥ Rabb al-Barīyah bi-sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Khazrajīyah was completed at the end of the month of Ramaḍān, on Tuesday, of the year 972 [of the Hijrah = 11 May, 1565], at al-Mashhad al-Aqdas, may prayer and peace be upon him who dignified it by his presence [Probably the eight Shiʻī Imām, ʻAlī al-Riḍā ibn Mūsá, died 818 or 819], by the hand of the poor servant Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥurr, may God pardon him. Amen."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Colophon of Treatise on the new meters in Arabic poetry. No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-hādhihi al-abḥr al-thalāthah takhruju min dāʼirat al-mutashābih. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Colophon of Treatise on the sixteen classical meters of Arabic poetry including phrases quoted from the Qurʼān: "Tammat."

title: 880-03 al-Rāmizah fī ʻilmay al-ʻarūḍ wa-al-qāfiyah : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUthmān al-Khazrajī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon of Treatise on the sixteen classical meters of Arabic poetry including phrases quoted from the Qurʼān: "It is completed."

title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Abū Tammām Ḥabīb ibn Aws al-Ṭāʼī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā 'Dīwān' nādirat al-falak wa-wāsiṭat ʻiqd al-dahr fī ṣināʻat al-shiʻr, naẓm al-Imām al-humām al-ḥādhiq al-fahhām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallām, al-Shaykh Abī Tammām Ḥabīb ibn Aws al-Ṭāʼī. Ḥarf al-Hamzah. Qāla yamdaḥu Khālid ibn Yazīd al-Shaybānī, wa-hādhā ʻalá al-tartīb alladhī rattabahu Abū Bakr al-Ṣūlī, wa-jaʻalahu thamāniyat aṣnāf: Yā mawḍiʻa al-Shadanīyati al-wajnāʼi // wa-muṣāriʻa al-īlāj wa-al-isrāʼi. Addi al-salāma muʻarrifan wa-muḥaṣṣiban // min Khālidi al-maʻrūfi wa-al-hayjāʼi ..."

title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Abū Tammām Ḥabīb ibn Aws al-Ṭāʼī.
note_text: Secundo folio: Wa-taʻarrafat ʻirfān zākhiratin wa-lam.

title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Abū Tammām Ḥabīb ibn Aws al-Ṭāʼī.
note_text: Colophon: "Bi-yad kātibihi ʻAbd al-Aḥad Karjī. Fī 12 T 1 [Tishrīn al-Awwal], sanat 1856."

title: 880-03 Dīwān : manuscript / Abū Tammām Ḥabīb ibn Aws al-Ṭāʼī.
note_text: Translation of the colophon: "By the hand of its copyist ʻAbd al-Aḥad Karjī. On 12 Tishrīn al-Awwal [October], 1856."

title: [Lectures on surgery].
note_text: The lectures (39 in number, with Introduction and Index) were delivered to students in London during 1829. They concern surgery and kindred subject matter.

title: Partielle Differentialgleichungen; Anwendungen der Abel'schen Functionen; Infinitesimalgeometrie; Bestimmte Integration / [vorgetragen von Prof. Christoffel], 1885-1886.
note_text: Lecture notes taken by Lehmann during four mathematics classes taught by Professor Christoffel at Strassburg during the 1885-1886 school session.

title: Robert Duer's receipt book, 10th of July, 1812 : book 10.
note_text: Likely Duer's pharmacy/materia medica class notes, as he graduated from the University of Pennsylvania in 1814.

title: Ḥāshiyat Tahdhīb Jānqarī. -- [17--?].
note_text: Mach gives title as: Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Ḥāshiyat Mīr Abī al-Fatḥ.

title: Kifāyat al-ghulām fī iʻrāb al-kalām. -- [15--?].
note_text: Also known as: al-Alfīyah.

title: Excerpta ex diariis : mélanges de médecine et de chirurgie.
note_text: Entries are dated 1838-1843 and include an index on the final 23 pages.

title: [Manuscrits d'un chirurgien russe ou tchèque].
note_text: Manuscript of a Russian or Czech surgeon on various subjects, with some entries dated from 1833 to 1842.

title: Physiology : lectures on the physical conditions of the tissues of the human body as applied to the explanation of vital phenomena : delivered at the College of France, 1834 / by F. Magendie, Professor of Physiology and Medicine, 1834.
note_text: Notes taken down by Robert Sewell, with the 7 p. at end titled "Index."

title: Sharḥ al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī. -- 1728.
note_text: Variant title in manuscript: Sharḥ mushkilāt al-mukhtaṣar fī ʻilm al-ʻarūḍ.

title: Sharḥ al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī. -- 1728.
note_text: Followed by 3 pages (25 verso-26), untitled and ending abruptly, unrelated to primary text.

title: Receipes for takeing of cemicals, 1850.
note_text: Recipes for mixing chemicals.

title: Note-book of experiments and observations on anatomy and physiology / George Gulliver, January 1839.
note_text: Includes much of his original research on the blood.

title: al-Durr al-manẓūm. -- 1731 or 2.
note_text: Variant title in manuscript: Naẓm farāʾiḍ Multaqá al-abḥur.

title: [Kitāb fī al-farāʾiḍ]. -- 1828 or 9.
note_text: Followed by an untitled 2-page treatise on same subject; ends abruptly.

title: [Kitāb fī al-farāʾiḍ]. -- 1828 or 9.
note_text: Last 3 leaves comprised of notes.

title: al-ʻArūḍ al-Andalusī. -- [17--].
note_text: A few pages of notes precede and follow main text.

title: Excelsior diary : Columbian edition, 1893 / [signed in ink on title page: Geo. W. Vansint].
note_text: Diary includes a blank page for each date, printed almanac and calendar, and pages for accounts.

title: Account book, 1862-1870.
note_text: Includes patient information concerning the doctor's practice in New Haven, Conn.

title: Economic impact of ski recreation and second homes : a reconnaissance study of Stowe, Vermont / by Lloyd C. Irland and Richard C. Gannon ; with Margaret Coon...[et al.]. 1974.
note_text: Final report of a cooperative aid study by the Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies and the Northeastern Forest Experiment Station, USDA Forest Service, under Contract no. 23-00, 440, Supplement 15.

title: David Bushnell Exhibiton, May-June 1975, Sterling Memorial Library [by Andrew Patterson, Jr.]
note_text: Contains copies of legends used in the display cases, record cards of items exhibited, and a list of these items, and a bibliography.

title: The dialects of ancient Gaul. [Microform]
Mary Burrell's book / by Mary Burrell, 1854.
note_text: Mary Burrell's train traveled near the Isaac Foster party also from Plainfield and parts of her diary are quoted in Lucy Foster Sexton's The Foster Family, California Pioneers, Santa Barbara, 1925.

title: Overland journey : from Leesburg, Pennsylvania, to the California mines / by Alexander Love, 1849-1852.
note_text: The diary is composed of four notebooks and various sizes of letter paper sewed together in a homemade calf binding.

title: Collection of eight ham radio QSL calling cards. 1936-1939.
note_text: A QSL is generated when a first-time contact between two amateur radio operators (hams) or stations occurs. It is an acknowledgement of the listening and is usually the size of a postcard. Each card includes the call sign of its sender along with date and time of the call, equipment used to make the call, and any words or illustrations that describe the ham and his/her home. QSL means, "Do you confirm receipt of my transmission?" or "I confirm receipt of your transmission."

title: Indenture placing John Dikes into the service of John Morris, joiner.
note_text: "This indenture witnesseth that [John Dikes], one of the poor [boys] of the charity-school [commonly called the Blue Coat School in the Parish of St. Margaret, Westminster, in the county of Middlesex] doth put h[im]self apprentice to [John Morris of the Parish of St. John the Evangelist, joiner] to learn h[is] art, and with h[im] after the manner of an apprentice to serve from the day of the date hereof, unto the full end and term of [seven] years ... And the said M[aster], (in consideration of the sum of [five] pounds paid to [him] ... ) ... shall teach and instruct, or cause to be taught and instructed, finding unto his said apprentice, meat drink apparel, lodging, washing, and all other necessaries ... In witness thereof, the parties abovenamed to these indentures interchangeably have put their hands and seals the [sixth] day of [October], Anno Dom. 17[40] ... [Memorandm. And it is further covenanted & agreed that the sd. Master shall find and provide for his sd. apprentice one complete suite of new cloths both of linnen and woolen at the expiration of the sd. term. John Morris."

note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir yā karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa aqfāl khazāyin qulūb ahl al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻirfān wa-khaṣṣahum bi-fahm mushkilāt kitābihi fa-ʻabbarū ʻanhā bi-awḍaḥ ʻibārah wa-aṣaḥḥ dalīl wa-burhān wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-mabʻūth bi-afḍal al-lughāt min ashraf al-ʻUrbān wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ulī al-riwāyah wa-al-dirāyah wa-al-itqān. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ḥaqīr al-muqaṣṣir faqīr al-muṣawwir Muḥammad al-Munayyir al-Samānūdī jammalahu Allāh bi-ishrāq al-sirr al-shuhūdī ..."

title: 880-02 Tazyīn al-mamālik bi-manāqib al-Imām Mālik : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Hādhā juzʼ laṭīf tarjamtu fīhi al-Imām Mālik ibn Anas raḍiya Allāh ʻanh sammaytuhu Tazyīn al-mamālik bi-manāqib al-Imām Mālik ..."

title: 880-02 Kifāyat al-muḥtāj fī qiṣṣat al-isrāʼ wa-al-miʻrāj : manuscript / Yūsuf Fakhr.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā // li-dīnihi al-qawīmi wa-irtaḍānā ..."

title: 880-02 Kifāyat al-muḥtāj fī qiṣṣat al-isrāʼ wa-al-miʻrāj : manuscript / Yūsuf Fakhr.
note_text: Ends with: "Wa-nasʼalu Allāh subḥānahu wa-taʻālá an yuʻīnanā ʻalá dhālik wa-an yasluka bi-nā aḥsan al-masālik wa-an yumattiʻanā bi-al-naẓar ilá wajhika [wajhihi] al-karīm fī dār al-qarār wa-an yudīma ʻalaynā niʻmat al-Islām wa-an yaḥshuranā fī zumrat Nabīyihi ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām wa-an yashghulanā wa-yastaʻmilanā bi-mā fīhi riḍāh wa-an yajʻlanā min ahl 'Lā ilāha illā Allāh Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh'. Tamm."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar : manuscript / Abū al-Muntahá Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Maghnīsāwī.
note_text: Incipit: "Kitāb Abū al-Muntahá raḥmat Allāh ʻlayh. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā ilá ṭarīq al-sunnah wa-al-jamāʻah bi-faḍlihi al-ʻaẓīm wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá rasūlihi wa-ḥabībihi Muḥammad alladhī kāna ʻalá khuluq ʻaẓīm wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-dāʻīn ilá ṣirāṭ mustaqīm. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-mudhnib Abū al-Muntahá ʻaṣamahu Allāh taʻālá al-kabīr al-karīm ʻan al-khaṭāyā wa-al-maʻāṣī wa-min al-iʻtiqād al-fāsid al-ʻaqīm inna kitāb al-Fiqh al-akbar alladhī ṣannafahu al-Imām al-aʻẓam kitāb ṣaḥīḥ ... fa-ardtu an ajmaʻa kalimāt min al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-min al-kutub al-muʻtabarah ḥattá takūna sharḥan li-hādhā al-kitāb al-sharīf al-laṭīf ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Shāfiyat Ibn al-Ḥājib : manuscript / Raḍī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Astarābādhī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Ammā baʻda ḥamd Allāh ʻalá tawālī niʻamih wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlih Muḥammad wa-ʻitratih al-maʻṣūmīn fa-qad ʻazamtu ʻalá an ashraḥa Muqaddimat Ibn al-Ḥājib fī al-taṣrīf wa-al-khaṭṭ wa-absiṭa al-kalām fī sharḥihā ka-mā fī sharḥ ukhtihā baʻḍ al-basṭ fa-inna al-shurrāḥ qad iqtaṣarū ʻalá sharḥ muqaddimat al-iʻrāb wa-hādhā maʻa qurb al-taṣrīf min al-iʻrāb fī masās al-ḥājah wa-maʻa kawnihimā min jins wāḥid baʻīd min al-ṣawāb ..."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Jurjānī ʻalá Kashshāf al-Zamakhsharī : manuscript / al-Sayyid al-Sharīf al-Jurjānī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Jār Allāh al-ʻAllāmah, aḥsana Allāh ikrāmah fī dār al-maqāmah: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala al-Qurʼān kalāman munaẓẓaman. Dalla bi-lāmay al-jins wa-al-mulk ʻalá ikhtiṣāṣ al-ḥamd bi-hi taʻālá, thumma waṣafahu bi-inzāl al-Qurʼān wa-tanzīlih wa-mā ardafahumā bi-hi riʻāyatan li-barāʻat al-istihlāl ..."

title: 880-02 al-Nafḥah al-miskīyah wa-al-tuḥfah al-Makkīyah : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.
note_text: Incipit: "Innahu min Sulaymān wa-innahu bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah wa-al-tawfīq wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. ʻIlm al-ʻarūḍ, ʻilm al-maʻānī, ʻilm al-badīʻ wa-jamīʻ dhālika kulluhu ʻilm al-ʻArabīyah ..."

title: 880-02 Nuzʹhat al-arwāḥ fī baʻḍ awṣāf al-Jannah dār al-afrāḥ : manuscript / Yūsuf ibn Saʻīd al-Ṣafatī al-Mālikī al-Azʹharī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-Jannah manzilan li-ʻibādih al-muʼminīn wa-khaṣṣahum fīhā bi-mazīd al-iḥsān wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah shahādata man qālahā khāliṣan mukhliṣan min qalbihi dakhala al-Jannah wa-muttiʻa fīhā bi-al-ḥūr wa-al-wildān wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammad ʻabudhu wa-rasūluhu awwal man yadkhul al-Jannah wa-yaftaḥu la-hu Riḍwān ..."

title: 880-02 Kunh mā lā budda lil-murīd minh : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
note_text: Incipit of Kunh mā lā budda lil-murīd minh: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻaẓīm wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá wa-ālih [ālihi] wa-sallam. Saʼalta ayyuhā al-murīd al-mustarshid ʻan kunh mā lā budda laka minhu fa-ajabtuka fī hādhihi al-awrāq ʻalá mā saʼalta wa-Allāh walī al-tawfīq ..."

title: 880-02 Kunh mā lā budda lil-murīd minh : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.
note_text: Incipit of al-Itʹḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nazzala ahla al-Ḥadīth aʻlā [aʻlá] manāzil al-tashrīf wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī shahidat al-āyāt al-Qurʼānīyah wa-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah bi-annahu al-sayyid al-ʻafīf ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-rājī rabbahu al-raʼūf al-laṭīf Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf: Hādhā kitāb awradtu fīhi bi-mā lam usbaq min al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah al-wāridah ʻan khayr al-barīyah ... wa-sammaytuhu al-Itʹḥāfāt al-sanīyah bi-al-Aḥādīth al-Qudsīyah ..."

title: 880-02 al-Farāʼid al-ḥisān fī ʻaqāʼid ahl al-īmān : manuscript / ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭanūbī al-Mālikī al-Ashʻarī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūl afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajuhum ilá Allāh al-ʻalī al-qadr wa-al-shaʼn al-rājī minhu tabāraka wa-taʻālá al-raḥmah wa-al-ghufrān ʻIzz al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī al-Ṭanūbī al-Mālikī al-Ashʻarī. Hādhihi risālah fī uṣūl al-dīn jamaʻtuhā li-ṣighār al-banāt wa-al-banīn wa-sammaytuhā al-Farāʼid al-ḥisān fī ʻaqāʼid ahl al-īmān, jaʻalahā Allāh khāliṣah li-wajhihi al-karīm ..."

title: 880-02 al-Muʻtamad al-almaʻī al-mudhahhab fī ḥall Musnad al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī al-murattab. Al-Mujallad 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻĀbid ibn Aḥmad ʻAlī al-Sindī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shahidat li-waḥdānīyatihi al-āyāt al-bayyinah fī al-arḍ wa-al-samāwāt, wa-qāmat ʻalá rubūbīyatihi al-dalālāt, wa-dallat ʻalá ʻaẓamatihi ʻināyatuhu bi-al-aḥyāʼ wa-al-amwāt ... wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu ... Muḥammad ʻĀbid ibn Aḥmad ʻAlī al-Sindī mawlidan al-Anṣārī nasaban ... fa-sharaʻtu fī dhālika mustaʻīnan bi-al-Malik al-qadīr yawm al-Sabt, rābiʻ Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1231, wa-sammaytuhu Muʻtamad al-almaʻī al-muhadhdhab fī ḥall Musnad al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī al-murattab ..."

title: 880-03 al-Adhkār al-Nawawīyah, aw, Ḥilyat al-abrār wa-shiʻār al-akhyār fī talkhīṣ al-daʻawāt wa-al-adhkār al-mustaḥabbah fī al-layl wa-al-nahār : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: Most of the incipit page is damaged; the bracketed phrases are taken from the printed version: "Bi-ism [Allāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-qahh[ār, al-ʻazīz al-ghaffār, muqaddir al-aqdār, muṣarrif al-umūr, mukawwir al-layl ʻalá] al-nahār tabṣiratan li-ulī al-qu[lūb wa-al-abṣār, alladhī ayqaẓa min khalqihi man iṣṭafāhu] fa-adkhalahu fī jumlat al-akhyār [wa-waffaqa man ijtabāhu min ʻabīdihi fa-jaʻalahu min al-muqarrabīn al-abrār], wa-baṣṣara man aḥabbahu fa-zahhadahum fī h[dhihi al-dār fa-ijtahadū fī marḍātihi wa-al-taʼahhub li-dār al-qarār] wa-ijtināb mā yuskhiṭuhu wa-al-ḥadhar min ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Ḥizb al-Nawawī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Ṭayyib ibn Muḥammad al-Fāsī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yā man aḥzābuhu lam tazal muʼayyadah, ʻalá al-aʻdāʼ manṣūrah, wa-aḥbābuhu lam tazal aʻlāmuhum bi-dhikrihi manshūrahk, fī ṣūrah aʻẓim bi-hā min ṣūrah. Naḥmaduka ʻalá ālāʼika al-ʻāmmah madadta bi-hā fa-lam takun maqṣūrah ..."

title: Selections from the Qurʼan and invocations in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish : manuscript.
note_text: Ends with Sūrat al-Fātiḥah.

title: 880-02 al-Mawlid al-Nabawī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Aḥmad al-Buraʻī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala falaka al-qudrah ʻalá dawr al-ḥikmah fī aqṭār quṭb al-mijarrah mustadīran, wa-jaʻala qamar al-ʻizzah ʻalá ṣafāʼ ṣadaf qaʻr al-baḥr fī madārij al-kawākib mustanīran, wa-fataqa ʻalá ṣafaḥāt al-ufuq bi-yad al-aqdār min ṭīb al-kalām ʻanbaran wa-ʻabīran ..."

title: 880-02 al-Mawlid al-Nabawī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn Aḥmad al-Buraʻī.
note_text: Ends with: "Rabbanā taqabbal minnā innaka anta al-samīʻ al-ʻalīm wa-tub ʻalaynā innaka anta al-tawwāb al-raḥīm. Subḥāna Rabbika Rabb al-ʻizzah ʻammā yaṣifūn wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

title: 880-03 Insān al-ʻuyūn fī sīrat al-amīn al-maʼmūn : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Bāb dhikr maghāzīhi ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Dhukira anna maghāziyahu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ay, wa-hiya allatī ghazā fīhā bi-nafsihi kānat sabʻan wa-ʻishrīn, ay, wa-hiya Ghazwat Buwāṭ thumma Ghazwat al-ʻAshīrah thumma Ghazwat Ṣafwān ..."

title: 880-03 Insān al-ʻuyūn fī sīrat al-amīn al-maʼmūn : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī.
note_text: Ends with: "Wa-fī hādhihi al-sanah al-khāmisah khusifa al-qamar fa-ṣallá Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalyahi wa-sallam, bi-aṣḥābihi ṣalāt al-khusūf ḥattá injalá al-qamar wa-ṣārat al-Yahūd taḍribu bi-al-ṭisās wa-yaqūlūn: 'Saḥara al-qamar'. Tammat hādhihi al-ghazwah wa-min baʻdihā Ghazwat al-Khandaq."

title: 880-02 Sulāfat al-mudām al-tibrīyah fī takmīl sharḥ ḥizb al-quṭb Sayyidī Muḥammad al-Bakrī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Murtaḍá al-Zabīdī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ajrá maknūn aḥadīyatihi fī sufun wāḥidīyatihi wa-ahabb ʻalayhā riyāḥ raḥmānīyatihi fa-istawá ʻalá Jūdī ṣamadānīyatihi fa-adār bi-dawarānihā al-aflāk ..."

title: 880-02 al-Masāʼil al-muftá bi-hā ʻalá al-qadīm : manuscript / Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawawī.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Qāla, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: Faṣl. Kull masʼalah fīhā qawlān lil-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qadīm wa-jadīd, fa-al-jadīd huwa al-ṣaḥīḥ wa-ʻlayhi al-ʻamal li-anna al-qadīm marjūʻ ʻanh. Wa-istathná jamāʻah min aṣḥābinā naḥwa ʻishrīn masʼalah aw akthar ..."

title: 880-01 Ḥujjah sharʻīyah : manuscript.
note_text: Incipit: "Ujriyat bi-mā fīhi. Bi-al-Bāb al-ʻĀlī, aʻlāhu Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, wa-sharrafahu, bi-Miṣr al-maḥrūsah, baʻda al-idhn al-karīm min Ḥaḍrat Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā, fakhr al-mawālī al-ʻiẓām, qāḍī quḍāt al-Islām yawmaidhin bi-Miṣr al-maḥmīyah, al-muwaqqaʻ khaṭṭuhu wa-khatmuhu al-karīmayn aʻlāh, dāma ʻulāh. Āmīn, lil-faqīr ʻAlī al-Khaṭīb, aḥad kuttāb hādhihi al-Maḥkamah, bi-samāʻ wa-kitābat mā yaʼtī dhikruhu fīhi fa-ladayhi bi-al-majlis al-munʻaqid bi-Dīwān Qūmisiyūn al-Arāḍī al-Mīrīyah, al-kāʼin bi-Shāriʻ Jāmiʻ al-Kanjīyah, bi-Qism ʻĀbidīn, bi-Miṣr: Asqaṭa Wakīl Ḥaḍrat Mawlānā al-Khudaywi al-muʻaẓẓam, Muḥammad Tawfīq Bāshā, Khudaywi Miṣr ḥālan, dāmat saʻādatuhu wa-tawālat masarratuhu. Āmīn, huwa Janāb Idwār Būtarūn, aʻḍāʼ Faransāwī bi-al-Qūmisiyūn al-madhkūr ḥālan, al-wakālah al-sharʻīyah fī shaʼn mā sa-yudhkaru fīhi wa-ghayrihi, al-maqbūlah bi-al-ṭarīq al-sharʻī, ḥaqq jihat al-mīrī al-mashmūlah bi-wilāyat Ḥaḍrat Mawlānā al-Khudaywi al-muʻaẓẓam al-mushār ilayhi, al-wilāyah al-ʻāmmah lil-ḥurmah Ḥasanah al-maʻrūfah bi-wālidat al-marḥūm Ḥabshī Muḥammad min ʻasākir al-Bāsh Buzk Kān, al-sākinah bi-Nāḥiyat Abū Rajwān al-Qiblī, bi-Mudīrīyat al-Jīzah, bint Sayyid ʻAbduh ibn Sulaymān, min arbāb al-maʻāshāt ..."

title: 880-02 al-Wasīlah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn al-Hāʼim.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻadada naʻmāʼihi, wa-al-shukru la-hu ʻalá tawālī ālāʼihi, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad khayr anbiyāʼihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi khayr awliyāʼihi, fa-inna kitābī al-mawḍūʻ fī ṣināʻat al-hawāʼī, al-musammá bi-al-Maʻūnah, lammā kathura ʻilmuhu, wa-kabura ʻalá himam ʻāmmat ahl al-ʻaṣr ḥajmuhu, raʼaytu an aqtaṣirahu fī awrāq qalīlah ʻalá maqāṣidihi al-jalīlah, li-yakūna la-hu dhālika ka-al-wasīlah, wa-yuqarriba ijtināʼ thamaratihi bi-alṭaf ḥīlah, fa-sharaʻtu fīmā qaṣadtu muʻtamidan ʻalá Allāh al-Karīm fī tasʹhīl mā aradtu, wa-rattabtuhu ayḍan ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāthat aqsām wa-khātimah ..."

title: 880-03 al-Muqaddimah : manuscript / Ibn Khaldūn.
note_text: Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Rabbihi al-ghanī bi-luṭfihi, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Khaldūn al-Ḥaḍramī, waffaqahu Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī la-hu al-ʻizzah wa-al-jabarūt, wa-bi-yadihi al-mulk wa-al-malakūt, wa-la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná wa-al-nuʻūt, al-ʻālim fa-lā [yaghrubu ʻanhu mā] yuẓhiruhu [tuẓhiruhu] al-najwá, aw yukhfīhi al-sukūt, al-qādir, fa-lā yuʻjizuhu shayʼ fī al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ wa-lā yafūt, anshaʼanā min al-arḍ nasaman, wa-istaʻmaranā fīhā ajyālan wa-umaman, wa-yassara lanā minhā arzāqan wa-qisaman, yukannifunā al-arḥām wa-al-buyūt, wa-yakfulunā al-rizq wa-al-qūt, wa-tablīnnā al-ayyām wa-al-wuqūt, wa-taʻtawirunā al-ājāl allatī khaṭṭa ʻalaynā kitābahā al-mawqūt, wa-la-hu al-baqāʼ wa-al-thubūt, wa-Huwa al-ḥayy alladhī lā yamūt ..."
